configuration.stem: Describe one courtship behavior and one parenting behavior, including how each contributes to the reproductive success of the animal.
configuration.teacherAnswer:
Answers should include an example of courtship behavior is the
presentation of large or colorful body parts. Male animals try to
convince female animals that they are healthy and have good
genes. An example of a parenting behavior is caring for the
offspring after they are born for an extended period of time.
